text: 18.26: FG 19.8Ana maaŋ mbuav, ana vhɨra vov Zudaiŋ Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi phena vhen verav, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai. Ana maaŋ mbuav, ana vhɨra gumgi gu mbigir rɨvi fhu. Ana mba buni nzuaim, Prisira gu Akuira ana buni mbararagiap, mani ana suaŋgiap, ana ko wani wo phenan vugap, Fhe Bakɨme nzuai tuavar ana khɨvi, ana tuituigip ana kaŋgirga.
